description:
Captain Crook`s Tentacruel are used to poach any Pokémon that Captain Crook and Scuz see from their pirate ship.
The Pokéballs that contain the Tentacruel are shot out of a cannon to release them near their targets.
Ash Ketchum and Misty manage to capture Captain Crook and his crew and Officer Jenny arrested them. The Tentacruel belonging to Captain Crook were released into the wild.
name: Dokukurage (Debo)
